title: 87/425/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 July 1987 amending Decision 86/473/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Uruguay approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 15 July 1987
amending Decision 86/473/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Uruguay approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
(87/425/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 86/473/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 July 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 12. 1977, p. 85.
(2) OJ No L 275, 26. 9. 1986, p. 36.
(3) OJ No L 279, 30. 9. 1986, p. 53.
ANNEX
